display_long_description:
In a nutshell, this is unbelievably tough VR game—all about the “simple” act of walking.

You’ll be strapped into two wobbly "legs", controlling each one with a hand controller. Try not to panic (spoiler: you will), grab every star you can, and haul yourself to the next level before you faceplant into the ground.

We originally made this game because we thought "real walking" in VR would be a total piece of cake. Spoiler #2: We were so wrong. It’s straight-up hell—but shockingly, the kind of hell that’s weirdly addictive and hilarious.

So we cranked out 42 soul-crushing levels to share this chaotic torture with you. And we’re not stopping there—we’ll keep dropping new levels to make this one-of-a-kind pain (and joy) last even longer. Don’t stress (you’ll definitely stress), you’ve got this… hopefully you won’t cry while “walking.”
